trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The salvager can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier.

action.name: Coral Rapier
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Inject Toxin (2/Day)
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.
